resp = client.indices.create(
    index="my-index",
    mappings={
        "properties": {
            "my_vector": {
                "type": "dense_vector",
                "dims": 3
            },
            "my_text": {
                "type": "keyword"
            }
        }
    },
)
print(resp)

resp1 = client.index(
    index="my-index",
    id="1",
    document={
        "my_text": "text1",
        "my_vector": [
            0.5,
            10,
            6
        ]
    },
)
print(resp1)

resp2 = client.index(
    index="my-index",
    id="2",
    document={
        "my_text": "text2",
        "my_vector": [
            -0.5,
            10,
            10
        ]
    },
)
print(resp2)
